trans-unit.source: vsys - (Optional) The vsys to put the DAG tags in (default: vsys1).
trans-unit.target: vsys -（可选）将DAG标签放入的vsys（默认值： vsys1 ）。

trans-unit.source: vsys - (Required) The vsys that will use this virtual router. This should be something like vsys1 or vsys3.
trans-unit.target: vsys -（必需）将使用此虚拟路由器的vsys。这应该类似于 vsys1 或 vsys3 。

trans-unit.source: vsys_list - (Optional) A subset of all available vsys on the firewall that should be in this device group. If the firewall is a virtual firewall, then this parameter should just be omitted.
trans-unit.target: vsys_list -（可选）应该在此设备组中的防火墙上所有可用vsys的子集。如果防火墙是虚拟防火墙，则应忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: vulnerability - (Optional) Profile Setting: Profiles - The Vulnerability Protection setting.
trans-unit.target: vulnerability -（可选）配置文件设置： Profiles -漏洞保护设置。

trans-unit.source: waf_configuration - (Optional) Web Application Firewall configuration settings. The waf_configuration block supports fields documented below.
trans-unit.target: waf_configuration -（可选）Web应用程序防火墙配置设置。所述 waf_configuration 块支持字段下面介绍。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_capacity_timeout (Default: "10m") A maximum duration that Terraform should wait for ASG instances to be healthy before timing out. (See also Waiting for Capacity below.) Setting this to "0" causes Terraform to skip all Capacity Waiting behavior.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_capacity_timeout （默认值：“ 10m”）Terraform在超时之前应等待ASG实例运行正常的最大持续时间。（另请参见下面的“等待容量”。）将此值设置为“ 0”会使Terraform跳过所有“容量等待”行为。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_elb_capacity - (Optional) Setting this will cause Terraform to wait for exactly this number of healthy instances in all attached load balancers on both create and update operations. (Takes precedence over min_elb_capacity behavior.) (See also Waiting for Capacity below.)
trans-unit.target: wait_for_elb_capacity -（可选）设置此项将导致Terraform在创建和更新操作上，在所有连接的负载均衡器中恰好等待一定数量的正常实例。（优先于 min_elb_capacity 行为。）（另请参见下面的“等待容量”。）

trans-unit.source: wait_for_fulfillment - (Optional; Default: false) If set, Terraform will wait for the Spot Request to be fulfilled, and will throw an error if the timeout of 10m is reached.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_fulfillment -（可选；默认值：false）如果设置，Terraform将等待现场请求得到满足，并且如果达到10m的超时将抛出错误。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_guest_net_routable - (Optional) Controls whether or not the guest network waiter waits for a routable address. When false, the waiter does not wait for a default gateway, nor are IP addresses checked against any discovered default gateways as part of its success criteria. Default: true.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_guest_net_routable -（可选）控制来宾网络服务员是否等待可路由的地址。如果为 false ，那么服务员将不等待默认网关，也不会根据发现的默认网关检查IP地址作为其成功标准的一部分。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_guest_net_timeout - (Optional) The amount of time, in minutes, to wait for an available IP address on this virtual machine. A value less than 1 disables the waiter. Default: 5 minutes.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_guest_net_timeout -（可选）在此虚拟机上等待可用IP地址的时间（以分钟为单位）。小于1的值将禁用侍者。默认值：5分钟。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_instances - (Optional) Whether to wait for all instances to be created/updated before returning. Note that if this is set to true and the operation does not succeed, Terraform will continue trying until it times out.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_instances -（可选）在返回之前是否等待所有实例的创建/更新。请注意，如果将其设置为true并且该操作没有成功，则Terraform将继续尝试直到超时。

trans-unit.source: wait_for_ready_timeout - (Default: 20m) The maximum duration that Terraform should wait for an Elastic Beanstalk Environment to be in a ready state before timing out.
trans-unit.target: wait_for_ready_timeout -（默认值： 20m ）Terraform在超时之前应等待Elastic Beanstalk环境处于就绪状态的最大持续时间。

trans-unit.source: wait_index - (Optional) Index number used to enable blocking quereis.
trans-unit.target: wait_index -（可选）用于启用阻塞查询的索引号。

trans-unit.source: wait_time - (Optional) Max time the client should wait for a blocking query to return.
trans-unit.target: wait_time -（可选）客户端应等待阻塞查询返回的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: wait_time_in_minutes - (Optional) The number of minutes to wait before the status of a blue/green deployment changed to Stopped if rerouting is not started manually. Applies only to the STOP_DEPLOYMENT option for action_on_timeout.
trans-unit.target: wait_time_in_minutes -（可选）如果未手动启动重新路由，则蓝/绿色部署状态更改为“已停止”之前要等待的分钟数。仅适用于 STOP_DEPLOYMENT 的选项 action_on_timeout 。

trans-unit.source: wait_until_associated - (Optional) In cases where the OpenStack environment does not automatically wait until the association has finished, set this option to have Terraform poll the instance until the floating IP has been associated. Defaults to false.

trans-unit.source: zipmap(list, list) - Creates a map from a list of keys and a list of values. The keys must all be of type string, and the length of the lists must be the same. For example, to output a mapping of AWS IAM user names to the fingerprint of the key used to encrypt their initial password, you might use: zipmap(aws_iam_user.users.*.name, aws_iam_user_login_profile.users.*.key_fingerprint).
trans-unit.target: zipmap(list, list) -从键列表和值列表创建映射。键必须全部为字符串类型，并且列表的长度必须相同。例如，要输出AWS IAM用户名到用于加密其初始密码的密钥的指纹的映射，您可以使用： zipmap(aws_iam_user.users.*.name, aws_iam_user_login_profile.users.*.key_fingerprint) 。

trans-unit.source: zone - (Optional, Computed) The GCP zone where your data is stored and used (i.e. where the master and the worker nodes will be created in). If region is set to 'global' (default) then zone is mandatory, otherwise GCP is able to make use of Auto Zone Placement to determine this automatically for you. Note: This setting additionally determines and restricts which computing resources are available for use with other configs such as cluster_config.master_config.machine_type and cluster_config.worker_config.machine_type.

trans-unit.source: MySQL is a relational database server. The MySQL provider exposes resources used to manage the configuration of resources in a MySQL server.

trans-unit.target: RabbitMQ是AMQP消息代理服务器。RabbitMQ提供程序公开用于管理RabbitMQ服务器中资源配置的资源。

trans-unit.source: Debug logging in EMR is implemented as a step. It is highly recommended to utilize the lifecycle configuration block with ignore_changes if other steps are being managed outside of Terraform.
trans-unit.target: EMR中的调试日志记录是一个步骤。如果在Terraform之外管理其他步骤，则强烈建议将生命周期配置块与 ignore_changes 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The Checkpoint client code used by Terraform is available for review by any interested party.

trans-unit.source: Terraform Enterprise (TFE) includes a private module registry, available at both Pro and Premium tiers.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Enterprise（TFE）包括一个专用模块注册表，可在Pro和Premium级别使用。

trans-unit.source: Terraform Enterprise provides a private module registry, to help you share code within your organization. Other services can also provide private registries by implementing Terraform's registry API.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Enterprise提供了一个私有模块注册表，可帮助您在组织内共享代码。其他服务也可以通过实现Terraform的注册表API来提供私有注册表。

trans-unit.source: Terraform Enterprise by HashiCorp is a commercial offering that supports an even stronger locking concept that can also detect attempts to create a new plan when an existing plan is already awaiting approval, by queuing Terraform operations in a central location. This allows teams to more easily coordinate and communicate about changes to infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: HashiCorp的Terraform Enterprise是一种商业产品，它支持更强大的锁定概念，当现有计划已经在等待批准时，该概念还可以通过在中央位置对Terraform操作进行排队来检测尝试创建新计划的尝试。这使团队可以更轻松地就基础架构的更改进行协调和沟通。

trans-unit.source: Terraform Enterprise is a commercial product from HashiCorp that also acts as a backend and provides encryption at rest for state. Terraform Enterprise also knows the identity of the user requesting state and maintains a history of state changes. This can be used to provide access control and detect any breaches.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Enterprise是HashiCorp的商业产品，它还充当后端并为状态提供静态加密。Terraform Enterprise还知道请求状态的用户的身份，并维护状态更改的历史记录。这可用于提供访问控制并检测任何违规。

trans-unit.source: MySQL is a relational database server. The MySQL provider exposes resources used to manage the configuration of resources in a MySQL server.
trans-unit.target: MySQL是关系数据库服务器。MySQL提供程序公开用于管理MySQL服务器中资源配置的资源。

trans-unit.source: HashiCorp Nomad is an application scheduler. The Nomad provider exposes resources to interact with a Nomad cluster.
trans-unit.target: HashiCorp Nomad是一个应用程序计划程序。Nomad提供程序公开资源以与Nomad群集进行交互。

trans-unit.source: PagerDuty is an alarm aggregation and dispatching service for system administrators and support teams. It collects alerts from your monitoring tools, gives you an overall view of all of your monitoring alarms, and alerts an on duty engineer if there’s a problem.
trans-unit.target: PagerDuty是针对系统管理员和支持团队的警报汇总和调度服务。它从您的监视工具收集警报，为您提供所有监视警报的整体视图，并在出现问题时警告值班工程师。

trans-unit.source: RabbitMQ is an AMQP message broker server. The RabbitMQ provider exposes resources used to manage the configuration of resources in a RabbitMQ server.
trans-unit.target: RabbitMQ是AMQP消息代理服务器。RabbitMQ提供程序公开用于管理RabbitMQ服务器中资源配置的资源。

trans-unit.source: Override files are the exception, as they're loaded after all non-override files, in alphabetical order.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖文件是一个例外，因为它们是按字母顺序在所有非覆盖文件之后加载的。

trans-unit.source: Providers are responsible in Terraform for defining and implementing data sources. Whereas a resource causes Terraform to create and manage a new infrastructure component, data sources present read-only views into pre-existing data, or they compute new values on the fly within Terraform itself.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序在Terraform中负责定义和实现数据源。而资源导致Terraform创建和管理一个新的基础设施组件，数据源现在只读意见纳入预先存在的数据，或者对中Terraform本身的飞行计算新值。

trans-unit.source: Remote state is the recommended solution to this problem. With a fully-featured state backend, Terraform can use remote locking as a measure to avoid two or more different users accidentally running Terraform at the same time, and thus ensure that each Terraform run begins with the most recent updated state.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用远程状态解决此问题。使用功能齐全的状态后端，Terraform可以使用远程锁定作为一种措施，以避免两个或多个不同的用户意外地同时运行Terraform，从而确保每次Terraform运行都以最近的更新状态开始。

trans-unit.source: -force - Don't ask for input for unlock confirmation.
trans-unit.target: -force -请勿输入解锁确认信息。

trans-unit.source: = (or no operator): exact version equality
trans-unit.target: = （或无运算符）：完全相同的版本

trans-unit.source: Computed is often used to represent values that are not user configurable or can not be known at time of terraform plan or apply, such as date of creation or a service specific UUID. Computed can be combined with other attributes to achieve specific behaviors, and can be used as output for interpolation into other resources
trans-unit.target: Computed 值通常用于表示用户无法配置的值，或在 terraform plan 或 apply 时无法得知的值，例如创建日期或特定于服务的UUID。 Computed 可以与其他属性组合以实现特定的行为，并且可以用作插值到其他资源的输出

trans-unit.source: DefaultFunc is most commonly used in Provider schemas, allows elements to have a default read from the environment.
trans-unit.target: DefaultFunc 在提供者模式中最常用，它允许元素从环境中读取默认值。

trans-unit.source: ForceNew indicates that any change in this field requires the resource to be destroyed and recreated.
trans-unit.target: ForceNew 指示此字段中的任何更改都要求销毁并重新创建资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: One and only one of "date" and "days" can be specified in one expiration configuration.
trans-unit.target: NOTE ：在一种到期配置中，只能指定“日期”和“天”之一。

trans-unit.source: Partial toggles partial-state mode. When disabled, all changes are merged into the state upon result of the operation. When enabled, only changes enabled with SetPartial are merged in.
trans-unit.target: Partial 切换部分状态模式。禁用后，所有更改将根据操作结果合并到状态中。启用后，仅合并使用 SetPartial 启用的更改。

trans-unit.source: Plan supports the following:
trans-unit.target: Plan 支持以下内容：

trans-unit.source: SetPartial tells Terraform what state changes to adopt upon completion of an operation. You should call SetPartial with every key that is safe to merge into the state. The parameter to SetPartial is a prefix, so if you have a nested structure and want to accept the whole thing, you can just specify the prefix.
trans-unit.target: SetPartial 告诉Terraform操作完成后采用什么状态更改。您应该使用可以安全合并到状态中的每个键来调用 SetPartial 。 SetPartial 的参数是前缀，因此，如果您有嵌套的结构并希望接受整个内容，则只需指定前缀即可。

trans-unit.source: Steps is slice property of TestCase, the object used to construct acceptance tests. Each step represents a full terraform apply of a given configuration language, followed by zero or more checks (defined later) to verify the application. Each Step is applied in order, and require its own configuration and optional check functions.
trans-unit.target: Steps 是TestCase的 slice属性，该对象用于构造验收测试。每个步骤代表给定配置语言的完整 terraform apply ，然后进行零次或多次检查（稍后定义）以验证该应用。每个 Step 均按顺序应用，并且需要其自己的配置和可选的检查功能。

trans-unit.source: TF_DATA_DIR changes the location where Terraform keeps its per-working-directory data, such as the current remote backend configuration.
trans-unit.target: TF_DATA_DIR 更改Terraform保留其每个工作目录数据的位置，例如当前的远程后端配置。

trans-unit.source: TestCase offers several fields for developers to add to customize and validate each test, defined below. The source for TestCase can be viewed here on godoc.org
trans-unit.target: TestCase 提供了几个字段，供开发人员添加以自定义和验证下面定义的每个测试。可在godoc.org上查看 TestCase 的源代码

trans-unit.source: TestCases are used to verify the features of a given part of a plugin. Each case should represent a scenario of normal usage of the plugin, from simple creation to creating, adding, and removing specific properties. In the next Section TestSteps, we’ll detail Steps portion of TestCase and see how to create these scenarios by iterating on Terraform configurations.
trans-unit.target: TestCases 用于验证插件给定部分的功能。从简单创建到创建，添加和删除特定属性，每种情况都应代表插件正常使用的场景。在下一部分 TestSteps 中，我们将详细介绍 TestCase 的 Steps 部分，并了解如何通过迭代Terraform配置来创建这些方案。

trans-unit.source: TestSteps are covered in detail in the next section, TestSteps.
trans-unit.target: TestStep s的详细介绍在下一节中， TestSteps 。

trans-unit.source: TestSteps represent the application of an actual Terraform configuration file to a given state. Each step requires a configuration as input and provides developers several means of validating the behavior of the specific resource under test.
trans-unit.target: TestStep 表示将实际Terraform配置文件应用到给定状态。每个步骤都需要一个配置作为输入，并为开发人员提供了几种方法来验证被测特定资源的行为。

trans-unit.source: TypeList items are stored in state in a zero based index data structure.
trans-unit.target: TypeList 项目以状态存储在基于零的索引数据结构中。

trans-unit.source: TypeMap items are stored in state with the key as the index. The count of items in a map is denoted by the % index:
trans-unit.target: TypeMap 项以键为索引的状态存储。映射中的项目计数由 % 索引表示：

trans-unit.source: TypeSet implements set behavior and is used to represent an unordered collection of items, meaning that their ordering specified does not need to be consistent, and the ordering itself has no impact on the behavior of the resource.
trans-unit.target: TypeSet 实现集合行为，并用于表示项目的无序集合，这意味着所指定的项目顺序不需要保持一致，并且排序本身对资源的行为没有影响。

trans-unit.source: TypeSet items are stored in state with an index value calculated by the hash of the attributes of the set.
trans-unit.target: TypeSet 项目以状态状态存储，该状态的索引值由集合属性的哈希值计算得出。

trans-unit.source: TypeString is also used for date/time data, the preferred format is RFC 3339 (you can use the provided validation function).
trans-unit.target: TypeString 还用于日期/时间数据，首选格式为RFC 3339（可以使用提供的验证功能）。

trans-unit.source: consul_catalog_nodes, consul_catalog_services, and consul_catalog_service have been renamed to consul_nodes, consul_services, and consul_service respectively. The prior naming will continue to work, but in the long term it may be deprecated and removed. This is to present a more consistent and intuitive naming convention for the resources.
trans-unit.target: consul_catalog_nodes ， consul_catalog_services 和 consul_catalog_service 已分别重命名为 consul_nodes ， consul_services 和 consul_service 。先前的命名将继续起作用，但是从长远来看，它可能会被弃用并删除。这是为了为资源提供更一致和直观的命名约定。

trans-unit.source: consul_service provides details about a specific Consul service in a given datacenter. The results include a list of nodes advertising the specified service, the node's IP address, port number, node ID, etc. By specifying a different datacenter in the query_options it is possible to retrieve a list of services from a different WAN-attached Consul datacenter.
trans-unit.target: consul_service 提供有关给定数据中心中特定Consul服务的详细信息。结果包括发布指定服务的节点列表，节点的IP地址，端口号，节点ID等。通过在 query_options 中指定其他数据中心，可以从连接WAN的其他Consul数据中心检索服务列表。 。

trans-unit.source: Serverless computing is a cloud computing model in which a cloud provider automatically manages the provisioning and allocation of compute resources. This contrasts with traditional cloud computing where the user is responsible for directly managing virtual servers.

trans-unit.source: x.y.z tags for releases. The registry uses tags to identify module versions. Release tag names must be a semantic version, which can optionally be prefixed with a v. For example, v1.0.4 and 0.9.2. To publish a module initially, at least one release tag must be present. Tags that don't look like version numbers are ignored.
trans-unit.target: x.y.z 标签用于发布。注册表使用标签来标识模块版本。发行标签名称必须是语义版本，可以选择以 v 开头。例如， v1.0.4 和 0.9.2 。要最初发布一个模块，必须至少存在一个发行标签。看起来不像版本号的标签将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A note on the naming of this resource: VMware refers to clusters of hosts in the UI and documentation as clusters, HA clusters, or DRS clusters. All of these refer to the same kind of resource (with the latter two referring to specific features of clustering). In Terraform, we use vsphere_compute_cluster to differentiate host clusters from datastore clusters, which are clusters of datastores that can be used to distribute load and ensure fault tolerance via distribution of virtual machines. Datastore clusters can also be managed through Terraform, via the vsphere_datastore_cluster resource.
trans-unit.target: 关于此资源命名的注释： VMware在UI和文档中将主机群集称为群集，HA群集或DRS群集。所有这些都指同一种资源（后两个指的是群集的特定功能）。在Terraform中，我们使用 vsphere_compute_cluster 区分主机群集和数据存储群集，数据存储群集是可以用于分配负载并通过虚拟机分发确保容错能力的数据存储群集。数据存储群集也可以通过Terraform通过 vsphere_datastore_cluster 资源进行管理。

trans-unit.target: 后端是完全可选的。您可以成功使用Terraform，而无需学习或使用后端。但是，它们确实可以解决在一定程度上困扰团队的痛点。如果您是个人，则可以不使用后端而摆脱困境。

trans-unit.source: Be careful! You can accidentally lock yourself out of your project using this resource. Proceed with caution.
trans-unit.target: 小心！您可能会意外地使用此资源将自己锁定在项目之外。请谨慎操作。

trans-unit.source: Be very careful with this command. If you unlock the state when someone else is holding the lock it could cause multiple writers. Force unlock should only be used to unlock your own lock in the situation where automatic unlocking failed.
trans-unit.target: 使用此命令时要非常小心。如果在其他人持有锁的情况下解锁状态，则可能导致多个编写者。强制解锁只能用于在自动解锁失败的情况下解锁自己的锁。

trans-unit.source: Bug Trackers:
trans-unit.target: 错误跟踪器：

trans-unit.source: Caution: The mysql_database resource can completely delete your database just as easily as it can create it. To avoid costly accidents, consider setting prevent_destroy on your database resources as an extra safety measure.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该 mysql_database 资源完全可以很容易地删除你的数据库，因为它可以创建它。为避免造成重大损失，请考虑在数据库资源上设置 prevent_destroy ，作为一项额外的安全措施。

trans-unit.source: Caution: The opc_compute_instance resource can completely delete your instance just as easily as it can create it. To avoid costly accidents, consider setting prevent_destroy on your instance resources as an extra safety measure.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该 opc_compute_instance 资源完全可以很容易地删除您的实例，因为它可以创建它。为了避免造成重大损失，请考虑在实例资源上设置 prevent_destroy 作为一项额外的安全措施。

trans-unit.source: Caution: The opc_compute_storage_volume resource can completely delete your storage volume just as easily as it can create it. To avoid costly accidents, consider setting prevent_destroy on your storage volume resources as an extra safety measure.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该 opc_compute_storage_volume 资源完全可以很容易地删除您的存储卷，因为它可以创建它。为了避免造成重大损失，请考虑在存储卷资源上设置 prevent_destroy 作为一项额外的安全措施。

trans-unit.source: CheckDestroy is called after all test steps have been ran, and Terraform has ran destroy on the remaining state. This allows developers to ensure any resource created is truly destroyed. This method receives the last known Terraform state as input, and commonly uses infrastructure SDKs to query APIs directly to verify the expected objects are no longer found, and should return an error if any resources remain.
trans-unit.target: 在运行完所有测试步骤之后，将调用CheckDestroy，并且Terraform 在剩余状态下已 destroy 。这使开发人员可以确保创建的任何资源都被真正销毁。此方法接收最后一个已知的Terraform状态作为输入，并且通常使用基础结构SDK直接查询API以验证是否不再找到所需的对象，如果剩余任何资源，则应返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Client Errors: Invalid requests will receive the relevant 4xx status. Except where noted below, the request should not be retried.
trans-unit.target: 客户端错误：无效的请求将收到相关的 4xx 状态。除非下文另有说明，否则不应重试该请求。

trans-unit.source: Cluster resource percentage: This is the default admission control mode, and allows you to specify a percentage of the cluster's CPU and memory resources to reserve as spare capacity, or have these settings automatically determined by failure tolerance levels. To use, set ha_admission_control_policy to resourcePercentage.
trans-unit.target: 群集资源百分比：这是默认的准入控制模式，可让您指定要保留为备用容量的群集CPU和内存资源的百分比，或者由容错级别自动确定这些设置。要使用，请将 ha_admission_control_policy 设置为 resourcePercentage 。

trans-unit.source: Command-line key/value pairs: Key/value pairs can be specified via the init command line. Note that many shells retain command-line flags in a history file, so this isn't recommended for secrets. To specify a single key/value pair, use the -backend-config="KEY=VALUE" option when running terraform init.
trans-unit.target: 命令行键/值对：可以通过 init 命令行指定键/值对。请注意，许多外壳程序在历史记录文件中保留命令行标志，因此不建议将其用于机密。要指定单个键/值对，请在运行 terraform init 时使用 -backend-config="KEY=VALUE" 选项。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility Note From Terraform 0.7.0 to 0.7.4 this resource was converted to a data source, and the resource form of it was deprecated. This turned out to be a design error since a cert request includes a random number in the form of the signature nonce, and so the data source form of this resource caused non-convergent configuration. The data source form is no longer supported as of Terraform 0.7.5 and any users should return to using the resource form.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性说明从Terraform 0.7.0到0.7.4，此资源已转换为数据源，并且已弃用该资源的资源形式。事实证明这是设计错误，因为证书请求包含签名随机数形式的随机数，因此该资源的数据源形式导致了非收敛配置。从Terraform 0.7.5开始不再支持数据源表单，任何用户都应返回使用资源表单。

trans-unit.source: Conditionally required - Disallowed when operatingSystemReferenceCode is provided, as the template will specify the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 有条件地需要 -当提供 operatingSystemReferenceCode 时不允许使用，因为模板将指定操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Dedicated failover hosts: This allows the reservation of dedicated failover hosts. Admission Control will block access to these hosts for normal operation to ensure that they are available for failover events. In the event that a dedicated host does not enough capacity, hosts that are not part of the dedicated pool will still be used for overflow if possible. To use, set ha_admission_control_policy to failoverHosts.
trans-unit.target: 专用故障转移主机：这允许保留专用故障转移主机。准入控制将阻止对这些主机的访问以使其正常运行，以确保它们可用于故障转移事件。如果专用主机没有足够的容量，则如果可能，不属于专用池一部分的主机仍将用于溢出。要使用，请将 ha_admission_control_policy 设置为 failoverHosts 。

trans-unit.source: Differing lineage: If the "lineage" value in the state differs, Terraform will not allow you to push the state. A differing lineage suggests that the states are completely different and you may lose data.
trans-unit.target: 沿袭不同：如果状态中的“沿袭”值不同，Terraform将不允许您推送状态。不同的血统表明状态完全不同，您可能会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: Differing lineage: The "lineage" is a unique ID assigned to a state when it is created. If a lineage is different, then it means the states were created at different times and its very likely you're modifying a different state. Terraform will not allow this.
trans-unit.target: 不同的血统：“血统”是创建状态时分配给状态的唯一ID。如果沿袭不同，则意味着状态是在不同时间创建的，很可能您正在修改其他状态。Terraform不允许这样做。

If the file contains secrets it may be kept in a secure data store, such as Vault, in which case it must be downloaded to the local disk before running Terraform.

trans-unit.source: Higher remote serial: If the "serial" value in the destination state is higher than the state being pushed, Terraform will prevent the push. A higher serial suggests that data is in the destination state that isn't accounted for in the local state being pushed.
trans-unit.target: 较高的远程串行：如果目标状态中的“串行”值高于被推送的状态，则Terraform将阻止推送。较高的序列号表明数据处于目标状态，而没有在推送的本地状态中考虑。

trans-unit.source: Higher serial: Every state has a monotonically increasing "serial" number. If the destination state has a higher serial, Terraform will not allow you to write it since it means that changes have occurred since the state you're attempting to write.
trans-unit.target: 更高的序列号：每个州都有一个单调递增的“序列号”。如果目标状态具有较高的序列号，则Terraform将不允许您对其进行写入，因为这意味着自您尝试写入的状态以来发生了更改。

trans-unit.source: IRC: Use the Gitter IRC bridge
trans-unit.target: IRC：使用Gitter IRC桥

trans-unit.source: Important Security Notice The private key generated by this resource will be stored unencrypted in your Terraform state file. Use of this resource for production deployments is not recommended. Instead, generate a private key file outside of Terraform and distribute it securely to the system where Terraform will be run.
trans-unit.target: 重要安全声明此资源生成的私钥将以未加密的方式存储在Terraform状态文件中。不建议将此资源用于生产部署。而是在Terraform外部生成私钥文件，并将其安全地分发到将运行Terraform的系统。

trans-unit.source: Important: Template variables in an inline template (such as consul_address above) must be escaped with a double-$. Unescaped interpolations will be processed by Terraform normally prior to executing the template.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：在联模板模板变量（如 consul_address 以上）必须使用双转义 $ 。在执行模板之前，Terraform将正常处理未转义的插值。

trans-unit.source: Important: The terraform push command is deprecated, and only works with the legacy version of Terraform Enterprise. In the current version of Terraform Enterprise, you can upload configurations using the API. See the docs about API-driven runs for more details.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：本 terraform push 命令已被弃用，只适用Terraform企业的旧版本。在当前版本的Terraform Enterprise中，您可以使用API​​上传配置。有关更多详细信息，请参见有关API驱动的运行的文档。

trans-unit.source: Important: This section only refers to the legacy version of Terraform Enterprise. The current version of Terraform Enterprise always manages its own state, and does not support arbitrary remote state backends.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：本节仅指Terraform Enterprise的旧版本。当前版本的Terraform Enterprise始终管理自己的状态，并且不支持任意的远程状态后端。

trans-unit.source: Important All data provided in the resource configuration will be written in cleartext to state and plan files generated by Terraform, and will appear in the console output when Terraform runs. Protect these artifacts accordingly. See the main provider documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明资源配置中提供的所有数据都将以明文形式写入，以声明和计划Terraform生成的文件，并在Terraform运行时显示在控制台输出中。相应地保护这些工件。有关更多详细信息，请参见主要提供者文档。

trans-unit.source: Important All data provided in the resource configuration will be written in cleartext to state and plan files generated by Terraform, and will appear in the console output when Terraform runs. Protect these artifacts accordingly. See the main provider documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明资源配置中提供的所有数据都将以明文形式写入，以声明和计划Terraform生成的文件，并在Terraform运行时显示在控制台输出中。相应地保护这些工件。有关更多详细信息，请参见主要提供者文档。

trans-unit.source: Important All data retrieved from Vault will be written in cleartext to state file generated by Terraform, will appear in the console output when Terraform runs, and may be included in plan files if secrets are interpolated into any resource attributes. Protect these artifacts accordingly. See the main provider documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明从Vault检索到的所有数据都将以明文形式写入Terraform生成的状态文件，并在Terraform运行时显示在控制台输出中，并且如果将秘密插入到任何资源属性中，则可能会包含在计划文件中。相应地保护这些工件。有关更多详细信息，请参见主要提供者文档。

trans-unit.source: Important Although https URLs can be used, there is currently no mechanism to authenticate the remote server except for general verification of the server certificate's chain of trust. Data retrieved from servers not under your control should be treated as untrustworthy.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明尽管可以使用 https URL，但是除了对服务器证书的信任链进行常规验证之外，目前没有任何机制可以对远程服务器进行身份验证。从不受您控制的服务器中检索的数据应被视为不可信任。

trans-unit.source: Important Because Vault does not support reading the configured credentials back from the API, Terraform cannot detect and correct drift on access_key or secret_key. Changing the values, however, will overwrite the previously stored values.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：由于Vault不支持从API读回配置的凭据，因此Terraform无法检测和纠正 access_key 或 secret_key 上的偏移。但是，更改值将覆盖先前存储的值。

trans-unit.source: Important Interacting with Vault from Terraform causes any secrets that you read and write to be persisted in both Terraform's state file and in any generated plan files. For any Terraform module that reads or writes Vault secrets, these files should be treated as sensitive and protected accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示从Terraform与Vault交互会导致您读取和写入的所有机密信息都同时保留在Terraform的状态文件和任何生成的计划文件中。对于任何读取或写入Vault机密的Terraform模块，应将这些文件视为敏感文件并进行相应保护。

trans-unit.source: Interactively: Terraform will interactively ask you for the required values, unless interactive input is disabled. Terraform will not prompt for optional values.
trans-unit.target: 交互式：除非禁用了交互式输入，否则Terraform将交互式要求您提供所需的值。Terraform不会提示您输入可选值。

trans-unit.source: IsUnitTest allows a test to run regardless of the TF_ACC environment variable. This should be used with care - only for fast tests on local resources (e.g. remote state with a local backend) but can be used to increase confidence in correct operation of Terraform without waiting for a full acceptance test run.
trans-unit.target: IsUnitTest允许运行测试，而不管TF_ACC环境变量如何。应谨慎使用-仅用于对本地资源进行快速测试（例如，具有本地后端的远程状态），但可用于提高对Terraform正确操作的信心，而无需等待完整的验收测试运行。

trans-unit.source: It’s important to reiterate that acceptance tests create actual cloud resources, possibly incurring expenses which are the responsibility of the user running the tests. Creating real infrastructure in tests verifies the described behavior of Terraform Plugins in real world use cases against the actual APIs, and verifies both local state and remote values match. Acceptance tests require a network connection and often require credentials to access an account for the given API.
trans-unit.target: 必须重申，接受测试会创建实际的云资源，这可能会产生费用，这是运行测试的用户的责任。在测试中创建真实的基础架构，可以根据实际的API验证Terraform插件在实际使用案例中的描述行为，并验证本地状态和远程值是否匹配。验收测试需要网络连接，并且通常需要凭据才能访问给定API的帐户。

trans-unit.source: Keeping sensitive information off disk: State is retrieved from backends on demand and only stored in memory. If you're using a backend such as Amazon S3, the only location the state ever is persisted is in S3.
trans-unit.target: 将敏感信息置于磁盘之外：根据需要从后端检索状态，并且仅将其存储在内存中。如果您使用的是后端（例如Amazon S3），则状态一直保持不变的唯一位置是S3。

trans-unit.source: Load Shedding: A 503 response indicates that the service is under load and can't process your request immediately. As with other 5xx errors you may retry after some delay, although clients should consider being more lenient with retry schedule in this case.
trans-unit.target: 甩负荷：阿 503 响应指示该服务是负载下，不能立即处理您的要求。与其他 5xx 错误一样，您可以在一段时间延迟后重试，尽管在这种情况下，客户应考虑对重试计划更为宽容。

trans-unit.source: Mailing list:Terraform Google Group

trans-unit.source: NOTE on aws_codepipeline: - the GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable must be set if the GitHub provider is specified.
trans-unit.target: 关于 aws_codepipeline 的注释： - 如果指定了GitHub提供程序，则必须设置 GITHUB_TOKEN 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on azurerm_sql_elasticpool: - The values of edition, dtu, and pool_size must be consistent with the Azure SQL Database Service Tiers. Any inconsistent argument configuration will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 关于 azurerm_sql_elasticpool 的注释： - edition ， dtu 和 pool_size 的值必须与Azure SQL数据库服务层一致。任何不一致的参数配置将被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on gateway_id and nat_gateway_id: The AWS API is very forgiving with these two attributes and the aws_route_table resource can be created with a NAT ID specified as a Gateway ID attribute. This will lead to a permanent diff between your configuration and statefile, as the API returns the correct parameters in the returned route table. If you're experiencing constant diffs in your aws_route_table resources, the first thing to check is whether or not you're specifying a NAT ID instead of a Gateway ID, or vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: 关于 gateway_id 和 nat_gateway_id 的说明： AWS API非常宽容了这两个属性，并且可以使用指定为网关ID属性的NAT ID创建 aws_route_table 资源。由于API在返回的路由表中返回正确的参数，因此这将导致您的配置和状态文件之间的永久性区别。如果您在 aws_route_table 资源中遇到恒定差异，那么首先要检查的是是否要指定NAT ID而不是网关ID，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on google_sql_database_instance: - Second-generation instances include a default 'root'@'%' user with no password. This user will be deleted by Terraform on instance creation. You should use google_sql_user to define a custom user with a restricted host and strong password.
trans-unit.target: google_sql_database_instance 上的注意事项： -第二代实例包括默认的'root'@'％'用户，没有密码。创建实例时，该用户将被Terraform删除。您应使用 google_sql_user 定义具有受限主机和强密码的自定义用户。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on mode: if neither global nor replicated is specified, the service is started in replicated mode with 1 replica. A change of service mode is not possible. The service has to be destroyed an recreated in the new mode.
trans-unit.target: 注意on mode ：如果既未指定 global 也不 replicated ，则将以1个副本的 replicated 模式启动服务。无法更改服务模式。必须销毁该服务，然后以新模式重新创建。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on policy: The permissions of a role specified in multiple policy blocks is cumulative. For example, if the same role is specified in two different policy each with different permissions (e.g. create and usage_with_grant, respectively), then the specified role with have both create and usage_with_grant privileges.
trans-unit.target: 有关 policy 注释：在多个策略块中指定的角色的权限是累积的。例如，如果同一个角色在两个不同的特定 policy 各有不同的权限（如 create 和 usage_with_grant 分别），然后同时拥有指定的角色 create 和 usage_with_grant 特权。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on propagating_vgws and the aws_vpn_gateway_route_propagation resource: If the propagating_vgws argument is present, it's not supported to also define route propagations using aws_vpn_gateway_route_propagation, since this resource will delete any propagating gateways not explicitly listed in propagating_vgws. Omit this argument when defining route propagation using the separate resource.
trans-unit.target: 在注 propagating_vgws 和 aws_vpn_gateway_route_propagation 资源：如果 propagating_vgws 参数存在，它不支持也定义使用途径的传播 aws_vpn_gateway_route_propagation ，因为这种资源将删除没有明确列出的任何传播网关 propagating_vgws 。使用单独的资源定义路由传播时，请忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Application Version Resource: When using the Application Version resource with multiple Elastic Beanstalk Environments it is possible that an error may be returned when attempting to delete an Application Version while it is still in use by a different environment. To work around this you can:
trans-unit.target: 关于应用程序版本资源的注释：当在多个Elastic Beanstalk环境中使用应用程序版本资源时，当尝试删除一个应用程序版本时，如果该版本仍被其他环境使用，则可能会返回错误。要解决此问题，您可以：

trans-unit.source: NOTE on AutoScaling Groups and ASG Attachments: Terraform currently provides both a standalone ASG Attachment resource (describing an ASG attached to an ELB), and an AutoScaling Group resource with load_balancers defined in-line. At this time you cannot use an ASG with in-line load balancers in conjunction with an ASG Attachment resource. Doing so will cause a conflict and will overwrite attachments.
trans-unit.target: 关于AutoScaling组和ASG附件的注释： Terraform当前提供了一个独立的ASG附件资源（描述了一个附加到ELB的ASG），以及一个提供了内联定义的 load_balancers 的AutoScaling Group资源。目前，您不能将带有串联负载均衡器的ASG与ASG附件资源一起使用。这样做将导致冲突并覆盖附件。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Certificates and docker-machine: As per Docker Remote API documentation, in any docker-machine environment, the Docker daemon uses an encrypted TCP socket (TLS) and requires cert_path for a successful connection. As an alternative, if using docker-machine, run eval $(docker-machine env <machine-name>) prior to running Terraform, and the host and certificate path will be extracted from the environment.
trans-unit.target: 关于证书和 docker-machine 的注释：根据Docker Remote API文档，在任何docker-machine环境中，Docker守护进程均使用加密的TCP套接字（TLS），并且需要 cert_path 才能成功进行连接。或者，如果使用 docker-machine ，请在运行Terraform之前运行 eval $(docker-machine env <machine-name>) ，然后将从环境中提取主机和证书路径。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on CodeCommit Availability: The CodeCommit is not yet rolled out in all regions - available regions are listed the AWS Docs.
trans-unit.target: 关于CodeCommit可用性的注释：尚未在所有地区推出CodeCommit- AWS Docs列出了可用地区。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on CodeCommit: The CodeCommit is not yet rolled out in all regions - available regions are listed the AWS Docs.
trans-unit.target: 关于CodeCommit的注释：尚未在所有地区推出CodeCommit- AWS Docs列出了可用地区。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on EBS block devices: If you use ebs_block_device on an aws_instance, Terraform will assume management over the full set of non-root EBS block devices for the instance, and treats additional block devices as drift. For this reason, ebs_block_device cannot be mixed with external aws_ebs_volume + aws_ebs_volume_attachment resources for a given instance.
trans-unit.target: 关于EBS块设备的注释：如果在 ebs_block_device 上使用 aws_instance ，则Terraform将承担对实例的整个非根EBS块设备集合的管理，并将其他块设备视为漂移。因此， ebs_block_device 不能与给定实例的外部 aws_ebs_volume + aws_ebs_volume_attachment 资源混合。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on EBS block devices: If you use ebs_block_device on an aws_instance, Terraform will assume management over the full set of non-root EBS block devices for the instance, and treats additional block devices as drift. For this reason, ebs_block_device cannot be mixed with external aws_ebs_volume + aws_volume_attachment resources for a given instance.
trans-unit.target: 关于EBS块设备的注释：如果在 ebs_block_device 上使用 aws_instance ，则Terraform将承担对实例的整个非根EBS块设备集合的管理，并将其他块设备视为漂移。因此， ebs_block_device 不能与给定实例的外部 aws_ebs_volume + aws_volume_attachment 资源混合。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on ECR Availability: The EC2 Container Registry is not yet rolled out in all regions - available regions are listed the AWS Docs.
trans-unit.target: 关于ECR可用性的注释：尚未在所有区域推出EC2容器注册表-AWS文档列出了可用区域。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on ELB Instances and ELB Attachments: Terraform currently provides both a standalone ELB Attachment resource (describing an instance attached to an ELB), and an ELB resource with instances defined in-line. At this time you cannot use an ELB with in-line instances in conjunction with a ELB Attachment resources. Doing so will cause a conflict and will overwrite attachments.
trans-unit.target: 关于ELB实例和ELB附件的注释： Terraform当前既提供独立的ELB附件资源（描述附加到ELB的实例），又提供带有嵌入式定义的 instances 的ELB资源。目前，您不能将ELB与串联实例以及ELB附件资源一起使用。这样做将导致冲突并覆盖附件。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on ELB Instances and ELB Attachments: Terraform currently provides both a standalone ELB Attachment resource (describing an instance attached to an ELB), and an Elastic Load Balancer resource with instances defined in-line. At this time you cannot use an ELB with in-line instances in conjunction with an ELB Attachment resource. Doing so will cause a conflict and will overwrite attachments.
trans-unit.target: 关于ELB实例和ELB附件的注释： Terraform当前既提供独立的ELB附件资源（描述附加到ELB的实例），又提供带有 instances 定义的实例的Elastic Load Balancer资源。目前，您不能将ELB与串联实例一起使用，并不能与ELB附件资源一起使用。这样做将导致冲突并覆盖附件。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on EMR-Managed security groups: These security groups will have any missing inbound or outbound access rules added and maintained by AWS, to ensure proper communication between instances in a cluster. The EMR service will maintain these rules for groups provided in emr_managed_master_security_group and emr_managed_slave_security_group; attempts to remove the required rules may succeed, only for the EMR service to re-add them in a matter of minutes. This may cause Terraform to fail to destroy an environment that contains an EMR cluster, because the EMR service does not revoke rules added on deletion, leaving a cyclic dependency between the security groups that prevents their deletion. To avoid this, use the revoke_rules_on_delete optional attribute for any Security Group used in emr_managed_master_security_group and emr_managed_slave_security_group. See Amazon EMR-Managed Security Groups for more information about the EMR-managed security group rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于EMR托管的安全组的说明：这些安全组将具有由AWS添加和维护的所有缺少的入站或出站访问规则，以确保集群中实例之间的正确通信。 EMR服务将为 emr_managed_master_security_group 和 emr_managed_slave_security_group 中提供的组维护这些规则；尝试删除所需规则的尝试只有在几分钟之内使EMR服务重新添加它们的尝试才可能成功。这可能会导致Terraform无法破坏包含EMR群集的环境，因为EMR服务不会撤消在删除时添加的规则，从而在安全组之间留下了循环依赖关系，从而阻止了它们的删除。为了避免这种情况，请使用 revoke_rules_on_delete emr_managed_master_security_group 和 emr_managed_slave_security_group 中使用的任何安全组的可选属性。有关有关EMR管理的安全组规则的更多信息，请参阅Amazon EMR管理的安全组。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on EMR-Managed security groups: These security groups will have any missing inbound or outbound access rules added and maintained by AWS, to ensure proper communication between instances in a cluster. The EMR service will maintain these rules for groups provided in emr_managed_master_security_group and emr_managed_slave_security_group; attempts to remove the required rules may succeed, only for the EMR service to re-add them in a matter of minutes. This may cause Terraform to fail to destroy an environment that contains an EMR cluster, because the EMR service does not revoke rules added on deletion, leaving a cyclic dependency between the security groups that prevents their deletion. To avoid this, use the revoke_rules_on_delete optional attribute for any Security Group used in emr_managed_master_security_group and emr_managed_slave_security_group. See Amazon EMR-Managed Security Groups for more information about the EMR-managed security group rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于EMR托管安全组的说明：这些安全组将具有AWS添加和维护的所有缺少的入站或出站访问规则，以确保集群中实例之间的正常通信。 EMR服务将为 emr_managed_master_security_group 和 emr_managed_slave_security_group 中提供的组维护这些规则；尝试删除所需规则的尝试只有在几分钟之内使EMR服务重新添加它们的尝试才能成功。这可能会导致Terraform无法破坏包含EMR群集的环境，因为EMR服务不会撤消在删除操作中添加的规则，从而在安全组之间留下了循环依赖关系，从而阻止了它们的删除。为了避免这种情况，请使用 revoke_rules_on_delete emr_managed_master_security_group 和 emr_managed_slave_security_group 中使用的任何安全组的可选属性。有关有关EMR管理的安全组规则的更多信息，请参阅Amazon EMR管理的安全组。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Egress rules: By default, AWS creates an ALLOW ALL egress rule when creating a new Security Group inside of a VPC. When creating a new Security Group inside a VPC, Terraform will remove this default rule, and require you specifically re-create it if you desire that rule. We feel this leads to fewer surprises in terms of controlling your egress rules. If you desire this rule to be in place, you can use this egress block:
trans-unit.target: 关于出口规则的注释：默认情况下，AWS 在VPC内创建新的安全组时会创建 ALLOW ALL 出口规则。在VPC内创建新的安全组时，Terraform将删除此默认规则，并且如果需要该规则，则要求您专门重新创建它。我们认为，这在控制您的出口规则方面会带来较少的惊喜。如果您希望此规则到位，则可以使用以下 egress 块：

trans-unit.source: NOTE on NIC failover order: An adapter can be in active_nics, standby_nics, or neither to flag it as unused. However, virtual switch creation or update operations will fail if a NIC is present in both settings, or if the NIC is not a valid NIC in network_adapters.
trans-unit.target: 关于NIC故障转移顺序的说明：适配器可以位于 active_nics ， standby_nics 中，也可以都不将其标记为未使用。但是，如果两个设置中都存在NIC，或者NIC在 network_adapters 中不是有效的NIC，则虚拟交换机的创建或更新操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Network ACLs and Network ACL Rules: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Network ACL Rule resource and a Network ACL resource with rules defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Network ACL with in-line rules in conjunction with any Network ACL Rule resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于网络ACL和网络ACL规则的说明： Terraform当前提供了独立的网络ACL规则资源和带有内联定义的规则的网络ACL资源。目前，您不能将带有串联规则的网络ACL与任何网络ACL规则资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Network ACLs and Network ACL Rules: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Network ACL Rule resource and a Network ACL resource with rules defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Network ACL with in-line rules in conjunction with any Network ACL Rule resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于网络ACL和网络ACL规则的说明： Terraform当前提供了独立的网络ACL规则资源和带有内联定义的规则的网络ACL资源。目前，您不能将带有串联规则的网络ACL与任何网络ACL规则资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Network Security Groups and Network Security Rules: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Network Security Rule resource, and allows for Network Security Rules to be defined in-line within the Network Security Group resource. At this time you cannot use a Network Security Group with in-line Network Security Rules in conjunction with any Network Security Rule resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于网络安全组和网络安全规则的注释： Terraform当前既提供了独立的网络安全规则资源，又允许在网络安全组资源中内联定义网络安全规则。目前，您无法将带有串联网络安全规则的网络安全组与任何网络安全规则资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Patch Baselines: The approved_patches and approval_rule are both marked as optional fields, but the Patch Baseline requires that at least one of them is specified.
trans-unit.target: 在修补程序基准注：本 approved_patches 和 approval_rule 都标记为可选字段，但修补程序基准要求，其中至少有一个被指定。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Route Tables and Routes: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Route resource and a Route Table resource with routes defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Route Table with in-line routes in conjunction with any Route resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite routes.
trans-unit.target: 关于路由表和路由的注意事项： Terraform当前同时提供了独立的路由资源和带有串联定义的路由的路由表资源。目前，您无法将路线表与串联路线以及任何路线资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖路由。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Route Tables and Routes: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Route resource and a Route Table resource with routes defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Route Table with in-line routes in conjunction with any Route resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于路由表和路由的注意事项： Terraform当前同时提供了独立的路由资源和带有串联定义的路由的路由表资源。目前，您无法将路线表与串联路线以及任何路线资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Route Tables and Routes: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Route resource and a Route Table resource with routes defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Route Table with in-line routes in conjunction with any Route resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于路由表和路由的注意事项： Terraform当前同时提供了独立的路由资源和带有串联定义的路由的路由表资源。目前，您无法将路由表与串联路由以及任何路由资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Security Group Rules: for usability purposes; Terraform allows the addition of a single Security Group Rule to multiple Security Groups, despite it having to define each rule individually per Security Group on Azure. As a result; in the event that one of the Rules on one of the Groups is modified by external factors, Terraform cannot reason as to whether or not that change should be propagated to the others; let alone choose one changed Rule configuration over another in case of a conflic. As such; terraform refresh only checks that the rule is still defined for each of the specified security_group_names; ignoring the actual parameters of the Rule and not updating the state with regards to them.
trans-unit.target: 有关安全组规则的注释：出于可用性目的； Terraform允许向多个安全组添加单个安全组规则，尽管它必须在Azure上为每个安全组分别定义每个规则。结果是;如果其中一个组的规则之一被外部因素修改，Terraform无法推断是否应将该更改传播给其他组；如果发生冲突，更不用说选择一个更改后的Rule配置了。因此; terraform refresh 仅检查是否仍为每个指定的 security_group_names 定义了规则；忽略规则的实际参数并且不更新关于它们的状态。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Security Groups and Security Group Rules: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Security Group Rule resource (a single ingress or egress rule), and a Security Group resource with ingress and egress rules defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Security Group with in-line rules in conjunction with any Security Group Rule resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于安全组和安全组规则的注释： Terraform当前既提供独立的安全组规则资源（单个 ingress 或 egress 规则），也提供具有串联定义的 ingress 和 egress 规则的安全组资源。目前，您无法将安全组与内联规则一起使用，并且不能与任何安全组规则资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Security Groups and Security Group Rules: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Security Group Rule resource (a single ingress or egress rule), and a Security Group resource with ingress and egress rules defined in-line. At this time you cannot use a Security Group with in-line rules in conjunction with any Security Group Rule resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of rule settings and will overwrite rules.
trans-unit.target: 关于安全组和安全组规则的说明： Terraform当前既提供独立的安全组规则资源（单个 ingress 或 egress 规则），也提供具有串联定义的 ingress 和 egress 规则的安全组资源。目前，您无法将安全组与内联规则一起使用，并且不能与任何安全组规则资源一起使用。这样做将导致规则设置冲突并覆盖规则。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Tainted Indexes: In certain edge cases, more than one tainted instance can be present for a single resource. When this happens, the -index flag is required to select which of the tainted instances to restore as primary. You can use the terraform show command to inspect the state and determine which index holds the instance you'd like to restore. In the vast majority of cases, there will only be one tainted instance, and the -index flag can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 关于污染索引的注释：在某些情况下，单个资源可能会出现多个污染实例。发生这种情况时，需要使用 -index 标志来选择将哪些污染实例还原为主要实例。您可以使用 terraform show 命令检查状态并确定哪个索引包含您要还原的实例。在大多数情况下，只有一个受污染的实例，并且 -index 标志可以省略。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on VPC Endpoint Services and VPC Endpoint Service Allowed Principals: Terraform provides both a standalone VPC Endpoint Service Allowed Principal resource and a VPC Endpoint Service resource with an allowed_principals attribute. Do not use the same principal ARN in both a VPC Endpoint Service resource and a VPC Endpoint Service Allowed Principal resource. Doing so will cause a conflict and will overwrite the association.
trans-unit.target: 关于VPC端点服务和VPC端点服务允许的主体的说明： Terraform提供了独立的VPC端点服务允许的主体资源和具有 allowed_principals 属性的VPC端点服务资源。在VPC端点服务资源和VPC端点服务允许的委托人资源中都不要使用相同的委托人ARN。这样做将导致冲突并覆盖关联。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on VPC Endpoints and VPC Endpoint Associations: Terraform provides both standalone VPC Endpoint Associations for Route Tables - (an association between a VPC endpoint and a single route_table_id) and Subnets - (an association between a VPC endpoint and a single subnet_id) and a VPC Endpoint resource with route_table_ids and subnet_ids attributes. Do not use the same resource ID in both a VPC Endpoint resource and a VPC Endpoint Association resource. Doing so will cause a conflict of associations and will overwrite the association.
trans-unit.target: 上VPC端点和VPC端点关联注： Terraform同时提供了独立的VPC端点协会为路由表 - （一个VPC端点和单个之间的关联 route_table_id ）和子网 - （一个VPC端点和单个之间的关联 subnet_id ）和VPC端点资源与 route_table_ids 和 subnet_ids 属性。不要在VPC端点资源和VPC端点关联资源中使用相同的资源ID。这样做将导致关联冲突并覆盖关联。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on VPC Endpoints and VPC Endpoint Route Table Associations: Terraform provides both a standalone VPC Endpoint Route Table Association (an association between a VPC endpoint and a single route_table_id) and a VPC Endpoint resource with a route_table_ids attribute. Do not use the same route table ID in both a VPC Endpoint resource and a VPC Endpoint Route Table Association resource. Doing so will cause a conflict of associations and will overwrite the association.
trans-unit.target: 关于VPC端点和VPC端点路由表关联的说明： Terraform提供了独立的VPC端点路由表关联（VPC端点和单个 route_table_id 之间的关联）以及具有 route_table_ids 属性的VPC端点资源。在VPC端点资源和VPC端点路由表关联资源中都不要使用相同的路由表ID。这样做将导致关联冲突并覆盖关联。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on VPC Endpoints and VPC Endpoint Subnet Associations: Terraform provides both a standalone VPC Endpoint Subnet Association (an association between a VPC endpoint and a single subnet_id) and a VPC Endpoint resource with a subnet_ids attribute. Do not use the same subnet ID in both a VPC Endpoint resource and a VPC Endpoint Subnet Association resource. Doing so will cause a conflict of associations and will overwrite the association.
trans-unit.target: 关于VPC端点和VPC端点子网关联的说明： Terraform提供了独立的VPC端 subnet_id 网关联（VPC端点和单个subnet_id之间的关联）以及具有 subnet_ids 属性的VPC端点资源。不要在VPC端点资源和VPC端点子网关联资源中使用相同的子网ID。这样做将导致关联冲突并覆盖关联。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on VPC Peering Connections and VPC Peering Connection Options: Terraform provides both a standalone VPC Peering Connection Options and a VPC Peering Connection resource with accepter and requester attributes. Do not manage options for the same VPC peering connection in both a VPC Peering Connection resource and a VPC Peering Connection Options resource. Doing so will cause a conflict of options and will overwrite the options. Using a VPC Peering Connection Options resource decouples management of the connection options from management of the VPC Peering Connection and allows options to be set correctly in cross-account scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 关于VPC对等连接和VPC对等连接选项的说明： Terraform提供了独立的VPC对等连接选项和具有 accepter 和 requester 属性的VPC对等连接资源。不要在VPC对等连接资源和VPC对等连接选项资源中管理同一VPC对等连接的选项。这样做将导致选项冲突并覆盖选项。使用VPC对等连接选项资源可将连接选项的管理与VPC对等连接的管理分离开来，并允许在跨帐户方案中正确设置选项。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on VPC Peering Connections and VPC Peering Connection Options: Terraform provides both a standalone VPC Peering Connection Options and a VPC Peering Connection resource with accepter and requester attributes. Do not manage options for the same VPC peering connection in both a VPC Peering Connection resource and a VPC Peering Connection Options resource. Doing so will cause a conflict of options and will overwrite the options. Using a VPC Peering Connection Options resource decouples management of the connection options from management of the VPC Peering Connection and allows options to be set correctly in cross-account scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 关于VPC对等连接和VPC对等连接选项的说明： Terraform提供了独立的VPC对等连接选项和具有 accepter 和 requester 属性的VPC对等连接资源。不要在VPC对等连接资源和VPC对等连接选项资源中管理同一VPC对等连接的选项。这样做将导致选项冲突并覆盖选项。使用VPC对等连接选项资源可将连接选项的管理与VPC对等连接的管理分离开来，并允许在跨帐户方案中正确设置选项。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on Virtual Networks and Subnet's: Terraform currently provides both a standalone Subnet resource, and allows for Subnets to be defined in-line within the Virtual Network resource. At this time you cannot use a Virtual Network with in-line Subnets in conjunction with any Subnet resources. Doing so will cause a conflict of Subnet configurations and will overwrite Subnet's.
trans-unit.target: 关于虚拟网络和子网的注释： Terraform当前既提供了独立的子网资源，又允许在虚拟网络资源中内联定义子网。目前，您不能将虚拟网络与串联子网以及任何子网资源一起使用。这样做将导致子网配置冲突并覆盖子网。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on instances, interfaces, and security groups: Terraform currently provides the capability to assign security groups via the aws_instance and the aws_network_interface resources. Using this resource in conjunction with security groups provided in-line in those resources will cause conflicts, and will lead to spurious diffs and undefined behavior - please use one or the other.
trans-unit.target: 关于实例，接口和安全组的注释： Terraform当前提供了通过 aws_instance 和 aws_network_interface 资源分配安全组的功能。将此资源与在这些资源中内联提供的安全组一起使用会导致冲突，并导致伪造的差异和不确定的行为-请使用其中一个。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on updating SSM documents: Only documents with a schema version of 2.0 or greater can update their content once created, see SSM Schema Features. To update a document with an older schema version you must recreate the resource.
trans-unit.target: 关于更新SSM文档的注意事项：创建后，只有架构版本为2.0或更高版本的文档才能更新其内容，请参阅SSM架构功能。要使用较旧的架构版本更新文档，必须重新创建资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE on updating SSM documents: Only documents with a schema version of 2.0 or greater can update their content once created, see SSM Schema Features. To update a document with an older schema version you must recreate the resource.
trans-unit.target: 关于更新SSM文档的注意事项：创建后，只有架构版本为2.0或更高版本的文档才能更新其内容，请参阅SSM架构功能。要使用较旧的架构版本更新文档，必须重新创建资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE regarding cirocnus_check vs a Circonus Check Bundle: The circonus_check resource is implemented in terms of a Circonus Check Bundle. The circonus_check creates a higher-level abstraction over the implementation of a Check Bundle. As such, the naming and structure does not map 1:1 with the underlying Circonus API.
trans-unit.target: 关于注 cirocnus_check Vs的Circonus检查软件包：该 circonus_check 资源的方面实现Circonus检查包。该 circonus_check 创建在检查包实行更高级别的抽象。因此，命名和结构不会与基础Circonus API 1：1映射。

trans-unit.source: NOTE regarding cirocnus_collector: The circonus_collector data source actually queries and operates on Circonus "brokers" at the broker group level. The circonus_collector is simply a renamed Circonus "broker" to make it clear what the function of the "broker" actually does: act as a fan-in agent that either pulls or has metrics pushed into it and funneled back through Circonus.
trans-unit.target: 注：关于 cirocnus_collector ：该 circonus_collector 数据源实际查询，并在经纪人组级别运行在Circonus“经纪人”。该 circonus_collector 是一个简单的更名Circonus“经纪人”要清楚什么是“经纪人”的功能实际上做：充当扇入代理，要么拉或具有通过Circonus推到它和漏斗回来指标。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:: Please note that internal LBs can only use ipv4 as the ip_address_type. You can only change to dualstack ip_address_type if the selected subnets are IPv6 enabled.
trans-unit.target: 注意：：请注意，内部LB只能将 ipv4 用作ip_address_type。如果所选子网启用了IPv6，则只能更改为 dualstack ip_address_type。

trans-unit.source: NOTE:: Please note that listeners that are attached to Application Load Balancers must use either HTTP or HTTPS protocols while listeners that are attached to Network Load Balancers must use the TCP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 注意：：请注意，连接到应用程序负载平衡器的侦听器必须使用 HTTP 或 HTTPS 协议，而连接到网络负载平衡器的侦听器必须使用 TCP 协议。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: "AutoCreated" ECS instance will be deleted after it is removed from scaling group, but "Attached" will be not.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从缩放组中删除“自动创建”的ECS实例后，该实例将被删除，但不会删除“附加的”实例。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: * If router_type is VBR, the role must be InitiatingSide and opposite_router_type must be VRouter. * If opposite_router_type is VBR, the role must be AcceptingSide and router_type must be VRouter.
trans-unit.target: 注意： *如果 router_type 为 VBR ，则 role 必须为 InitiatingSide ,而 opposite_router_type VRouter 必须为VRouter。 *如果 opposite_router_type 是 VBR ，该 role 必须是 AcceptingSide 和 router_type 必须是 VRouter 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: - The application must have a dyno in order to update its formation. - If the heroku formation resource is removed and deleted, this will be a no-op action in Heroku. The Heroku Platform does not have a DELETE endpoint for formation. - This resource works well with the heroku_app_release resource, which allows you to deploy a slug/release to an application before the formation can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 注意： -应用程序必须具有dyno才能更新其格式。-如果删除和删除了Heroku编队资源，这将是Heroku中的无操作动作。Heroku平台没有用于 formation 的 DELETE 端点。-此资源与 heroku_app_release 资源配合使用，可让您在更新构架之前将Slug / release部署到应用程序。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: A "Shared-Performance" instance can be changed to "Performance-guaranteed", but the change is irreversible.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以将“共享性能”实例更改为“性能保证”，但是更改是不可逆的。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: A CNAME needs to be configured from this Hostname to the Azure Website - otherwise Azure will reject the Hostname Binding.
trans-unit.target: 注意：需要将CNAME从该主机名配置为Azure网站-否则Azure将拒绝主机名绑定。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: A Floating IP can be assigned to a region OR a droplet_id. If both region AND droplet_id are specified, then the Floating IP will be assigned to the droplet and use that region
trans-unit.target: 注意：浮动IP可以分配给区域或drop_id。如果同时指定了区域和droplet_id，则将浮动IP分配给该液滴并使用该区域

trans-unit.source: NOTE: A new pricing model took effect on 2018-04-03, which requires the SKU PerGB2018. If you're provisioned resources before this date you have the option of remaining with the previous Pricing SKU and using the other SKU's defined above. More information about the Pricing SKU's is available at the following URI.
trans-unit.target: 注：新的定价模式，承担了影响 2018-04-03 ，这需要SKU PerGB2018 。如果您在此日期之前配置了资源，则可以选择保留先前的定价SKU，并使用上面定义的其他SKU。有关定价SKU的更多信息，请参见以下URI。

More information about the Pricing SKU's is available at the following URI.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: A snapshot in VMware differs from traditional disk snapshots, and can contain the actual running state of the virtual machine, data for all disks that have not been set to be independent from the snapshot (including ones that have been attached via the attach parameter to the vsphere_virtual_machinedisk sub-resource), and even the configuration of the virtual machine at the time of the snapshot. Virtual machine, disk activity, and configuration changes post-snapshot are not included in the original state. Use this resource with care! Neither VMware nor HashiCorp recommends retaining snapshots for a extended period of time and does NOT recommend using them as as backup feature. For more information on the limitation of virtual machine snapshots, see here.
trans-unit.target: NOTE: A snapshot in VMware differs from traditional disk snapshots, and can contain the actual running state of the virtual machine, data for all disks that have not been set to be independent from the snapshot (including ones that have been attached via the attach parameter to the vsphere_virtual_machine disk sub-resource), and even the configuration of the virtual machine at the time of the snapshot. Virtual machine, disk activity, and configuration changes post-snapshot are not included in the original state. Use this resource with care! Neither VMware nor HashiCorp recommends retaining snapshots for a extended period of time and does NOT recommend using them as as backup feature. For more information on the limitation of virtual machine snapshots, see 在这里。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: AWS performs behind-the-scenes modifications to some certificate files if they do not adhere to a specific format. These modifications will result in terraform forever believing that it needs to update the resources since the local and AWS file contents will not match after theses modifications occur. In order to prevent this from happening you must ensure that all your PEM-encoded files use UNIX line-breaks and that certificate_body contains only one certificate. All other certificates should go in certificate_chain. It is common for some Certificate Authorities to issue certificate files that have DOS line-breaks and that are actually multiple certificates concatenated together in order to form a full certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果某些证书文件不遵循特定格式，则AWS将对其进行幕后修改。这些修改将导致terraform永远相信它需要更新资源，因为发生这些修改后本地和AWS文件内容将不匹配。为了防止这种情况的发生，您必须确保所有PEM编码的文件都使用UNIX换行符，并且 certificate_body 仅包含一个证书。所有其他证书应放在 certificate_chain 中。对于某些证书颁发机构，通常会发布具有DOS换行符且实际上是多个证书并置在一起以形成完整证书链的证书文件。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Additional Source Control types will be added in the future, once support for them has been added in the Azure SDK for Go.
trans-unit.target: 注意：一旦在Go for Azure SDK中添加了对它们的支持，以后将添加其他源代码管理类型。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: All attributes in the vsphere_virtual_machine_snapshot resource are immutable and force a new resource if changed.
trans-unit.target: 注意： vsphere_virtual_machine_snapshot 资源中的所有属性都是不可变的，如果更改，将强制使用新资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: All clusters and standalone hosts have a resource pool, even if one has not been explicitly created. For more information, see the section on specifying the root resource pool in the vsphere_resource_pool data source documentation. This resource does not take a cluster or standalone host resource directly.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所有群集和独立主机都有一个资源池，即使尚未明确创建一个资源池。有关详细信息，请参见对节指定根资源池中 vsphere_resource_pool 数据源的文档。此资源不直接采用群集或独立主机资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: All fields in the vsphere_virtual_disk resource are currently immutable and force a new resource if changed.
trans-unit.target: 注意： vsphere_virtual_disk 资源中的所有字段当前都是不可变的，如果更改，将强制使用新资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: All reservable IOPS settings require vSphere 6.0 or higher and are ignored on older versions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所有可保留的IOPS设置都需要vSphere 6.0或更高版本，在旧版本中将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Any directory created as part of the operation when create_directories is enabled will not be deleted when the resource is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：启用 create_directories 时在操作中创建的任何目录在销毁资源时都不会删除。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Application orchestration template must be a valid Docker Compose YAML template.
trans-unit.target: 注：应用程序编排模板必须是有效的Docker Compose YAML模板。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Arukas' beta service will end on July 31, 2017. After that, official service will be started (however, the release date is undecided). We plan to upgrade this provider after official service starts. Until that time, this provider will not be maintained.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Arukas的Beta版服务将于2017年7月31日结束。之后，将开始正式服务（但是，发布日期尚未确定）。我们计划在正式服务开始后升级此提供程序。在此之前，将不会维护该提供程序。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At least one "Domain" or "Url" must be specified when creating a new rule.
trans-unit.target: 注意：创建新规则时，必须至少指定一个“域”或“ URL”。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At least one jdbc_target or s3_target must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 注意：必须至少指定一个 jdbc_target 或 s3_target 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At least one of executable_users, filter, owners or name_regex must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 注：在的至少一个 executable_users ， filter ， owners 或 name_regex 必须指定。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At least one of executable_users, filter, owners, or name_regex must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 注：在的至少一个 executable_users ， filter ， owners 或 name_regex 必须指定。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At least one of file_path or storage_account_id must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 注意：必须指定 file_path 或 storage_account_id 中的至少一个。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At least one of filter, instance_tags, or instance_id must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 注意：必须指定 filter ， instance_tags 或 instance_id 中的至少一个。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At present, 'PrePaid' instance cannot be deleted and must wait it to be outdated and release it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 注意：目前，'PrePaid'实例无法删除，必须等待其过时并自动释放。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At present, it does not support creating 'PostgreSQL' and 'PPAS' database. You have to login RDS instance to create manually.
trans-unit.target: 注意：目前，它不支持创建“ PostgreSQL”和“ PPAS”数据库。您必须登录RDS实例才能手动创建。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At present, the resource only supports to modify is_enabled.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前，资源仅支持修改 is_enabled 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At present, this resource only support swarm cluster.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当前，此资源仅支持群集集群。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At present, to avoid some unnecessary regulation confusion, SLB can not support alicloud international account to create "paybybandwidth" instance.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At this point, your Kubernetes cluster will have running masters and worker nodes, however, the worker nodes will not be able to join the Kubernetes cluster quite yet. The next section has the required Kubernetes configuration to enable the worker nodes to join the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此时，您的Kubernetes群集将具有正在运行的主节点和工作节点，但是，这些工作节点还不能加入Kubernetes群集。下一部分具有必需的Kubernetes配置，以使工作节点可以加入集群。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: At this time, Instance Groups cannot be destroyed through the API nor web interface. Instance Groups are destroyed when the EMR Cluster is destroyed. Terraform will resize any Instance Group to zero when destroying the resource.
trans-unit.target: 注意：目前，无法通过API或Web界面销毁实例组。销毁EMR群集时，销毁实例组。销毁资源时，Terraform会将所有实例组的大小调整为零。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Attaching to an App Service Environment requires the App Service Plan use a Premium SKU (when using an ASEv1) and the Isolated SKU (for an ASEv2).
trans-unit.target: 注意：附加到App Service环境需要App Service Plan使用 Premium SKU（使用ASEv1时）和 Isolated SKU（用于ASEv2）。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Authenticating using a Service Principal via the Azure CLI is unsupported. Service Principal credentials either need to be specified either as Environment Variables or in the Provider Block.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不支持通过Azure CLI使用服务主体进行身份验证。服务主体凭据需要指定为环境变量或在提供程序块中。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Authenticating via the Azure CLI is only supported when using a User Account. If you're using a Service Principal (e.g. via az login --service-principal) you should instead authenticate via the Service Principal directly.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当使用用户帐户时，才支持通过Azure CLI进行身份验证。如果您正在使用服务主体（例如，通过 az login --service-principal ），则应直接通过服务主体进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Authenticating via the Azure CLI is only supported when using a User Account. If you're using a Service Principal (e.g. via az login --service-principal) you should instead authenticate via the Service Principal directly.
